headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major calls to action. Use tight tracking for large sizes.

body.usage: All readable content. Minimum weight 500 for better legibility.

accessibility_rules: Line height must be at least 1.5 (leading-relaxed)
Paragraph spacing must be at least 1.5x font size

rules: Always use high contrast (AAA standard preferred)
Never use pure black (#000000), use Slate-900
Color must not be the only way to convey information (use icons + text)

buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-xl font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95 border-2 border-transparent hover:border-white/20

cards.classes: bg-white rounded-3xl border-2 border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-6 md:p-8

inputs.classes: h-14 rounded-2xl border-2 border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 px-4 text-lg focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-orange-100 transition-all

navigation.style: Bottom bar for mobile, clear labels
navigation.classes: fixed bottom-0 w-full bg-white border-t-2 border-slate-100 p-4 flex justify-around items-center z-50

rules: Avoid clutter. One primary action per screen.
Use whitespace generously to separate concepts.
Grid items must be direct children.

features: Text-to-Speech (TTS) button on all major text blocks
Help button visible on EVERY screen (fixed position)
Step-by-step wizards for complex tasks (Sign up, Upload)

visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide-React with thick strokes (stroke-width={2.5} or {3})
visual_enhancers.illustrations: Use 'Sticker' style flat illustrations for empty states
visual_enhancers.feedback: Use clear success/error states with icons and text

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Nunito' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Ensure the 'Help' button is always visible (z-50 fixed bottom-right or top-right).
For the 'Sign Up', break it into steps: 1. Choose Nickname, 2. Choose Avatar. Do not put everything on one page.
For 'Photo Upload', use a large drag-and-drop zone with a massive camera icon.
Use the provided image URLs for the initial seed data/mockups.
Do not use complex gradients for text backgrounds. Keep text on solid colors.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for overlays, not for main content reading.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
